trans-unit.source: Manages all the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
The InputManager class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Klassen InputManager er ansvarlig for alle inndata systemer i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Et filter er kode som lytter eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtre kan endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: En overvåking er kode som lytter eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Skjermer kan ikke endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The InputManager controls the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: InputManager kontrollerer inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: Inndata området i oppsamling behandler inndata i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene behandles i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] i Følg trinnene: 1.

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] inndata hendelsen eller hendelsene aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref> associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref> knyttet til gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: This class will not be available in Internet zone.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen vil være tilgjengelig i Internett-sonen.

trans-unit.source: The input manager.
Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*> method.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når en kontroll Menymodus ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Komponenter registrere representanter med denne hendelsen til å svare på en kontroll å skrive til den angitte overordnede Menymodus.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når resultatet av en treff-test kan ha blitt endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a collection of InputProviders registered with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av InputProviders som er registrert med den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of input provides.
Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref> is in menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"> </xref> i Menymodus.

trans-unit.source: The IsInMenuMode property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer IsInMenuMode `true` Hvis noen menyer er åpen, og returnerer `false` Hvis ingen menyer er åpen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref> is in menu mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"> </xref> i Menymodus; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*> method.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en kontroll forlater Menymodus ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Komponenter registrere representanter med denne hendelsen til å svare på en kontroll slik at den angitte overordnede Menymodus.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som representerer inndata enheten knyttet til den nyeste inndata hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The input device.
Called by components to leave menu mode.
A component calls this method to leave the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: En komponent kaller opp denne metoden hvis du vil beholde den angitte overordnede Menymodus.

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages.
Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden fører til intern antall åpne menyer å minske og angir de <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>egenskapen `false`, hvis dette er den siste menyen for å lukke.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The menu to leave.
menuSite is .

Occurs after the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events have been raised.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"> </xref> behandlingsprogrammer er ferdig med å behandle inndataene og tilhørende [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] hendelser har gitt.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or PostNotifyInput.
trans-unit.target: En overvåking er kode som lytter på <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>eller PostNotifyInput.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Skjermer kan ikke endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PostNotifyInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammer som er knyttet til PostNotifyInput startes i omvendt rekkefølge slik at behandlingsprogrammer lagt til av brukerne skal startes før behandlingsprogrammer i systemet.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene behandles i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] i Følg trinnene: 1.

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] inndata hendelsen eller hendelsene aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the PostNotifyInput event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
To be added.
Occurs after the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"> </xref> behandlingsprogrammer er ferdig med behandling av inndataene.

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or PostProcessInput.
trans-unit.target: Et filter er kode som lytter på <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>eller PostProcessInput.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtre kan endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PostProcessInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammer som er knyttet til PostProcessInput startes i omvendt rekkefølge slik at behandlingsprogrammer lagt til av brukerne skal startes før behandlingsprogrammer i systemet.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene behandles i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] i Følg trinnene: 1.

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.

The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the PostProcessInput event.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input, if the input was not canceled.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput"> </xref> behandlingsprogrammer er ferdig med behandling av de, hvis de ikke ble avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to PreNotifyInput or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: En overvåking er kode som lytter PreNotifyInput eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Skjermer kan ikke endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PreNotifyInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammer som er knyttet til PreNotifyInput startes i omvendt rekkefølge slik at behandlingsprogrammer lagt til av brukerne skal startes før behandlingsprogrammer i systemet.

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.

The input manager raises the PreNotifyInput event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.

The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref> starts to process the input item.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref> begynner å behandle element som inndata.

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to PreProcessInput or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Et filter er kode som lytter PreProcessInput eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtre kan endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PreProcessInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammer som er knyttet til PreProcessInput startes i omvendt rekkefølge slik at behandlingsprogrammer lagt til av brukerne skal startes før behandlingsprogrammer i systemet.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> will cancel the processing of the input.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A>på den <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs>sendt til den <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler>avbrytes behandlingen av inndataene.</xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene behandles i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] i Følg trinnene: 1.

The input manager raises the PreProcessInput event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.

To be added.
Gets the primary keyboard device.
The keyboard device.
Gets the primary mouse device.
The mouse device.
Processes the specified input synchronously.
A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Et filter er kode som lytter eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Skjermer kan ikke endre inndata området i oppsamling.

trans-unit.source: The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event.
trans-unit.target: De angitte inndataene behandles av alle filtre og skjermer og til slutt fordele til det aktuelle elementet som en inndata-hendelse.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene behandles i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] i Følg trinnene: 1.

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.

The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
The input to process.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all input events were handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle inndata hendelser ble håndtert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: input is .
Called by components to enter menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av klienter til å angi Menymodus.

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to enter the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: En komponent kaller opp denne metoden hvis du vil angi den angitte overordnede Menymodus.

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages.
Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden fører til intern antall åpne menyene skal økes og angir de <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>egenskapen `true`, hvis dette er den første menyen for å åpne.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The menu to enter.
menuSite is .
